overview:
Charles Campbell has 10 years of software development and engineering experience in a variety of development environments and platforms including PHP, Java, .NET, C#, Linux and Windows. He brings a breadth of knowledge in web application development, software as a service application development, the entire software development life-cycle and is an avid proponent of open source technologies and their potential to liberate the world from the confines of mediocrity.

Charles’ educational background includes a BS in Computer Science from UNC Chapel Hill complemented by best practices taught in IT Project Management and Business Strategy he acquired while pursuing a MS in the Management of Information Technology from the McIntire School of Commerce at UVA. His educational background has prepared him to have the opportunity to work with high performance software development teams at companies such as Boeing, Booz Allen Hamilton, Cisco Systems and other smaller software development companies. During his 10 years of experience working in high performance software development and engineering teams Charles has been thoroughly equipped with skills in transforming customer requirements into robust software applications.
